content: ऋण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऋ-क्त] {@--1@} Going. {@--2@} Guilty. --णं {@--1@} Debt; (as to the three kinds of debt, see अनृण); ऋणं कृ to incur debt; ऋणं दा to pay off or discharge debt; अंत्यं ऋणं (पितॄणं) the last debt to be paid to the manes, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} creation of a son. {@--2@} An obligation in general. {@--3@} (In <ab>alg.</ab>) The negative sign or quantity, minus (<ab>opp.</ab> धन). {@--4@} A fort, strong-hold. {@--5@} Water. {@--6@} Land.
